snippet: Two days after a corruption scandal rocked Albany, a new, unrelated plot emerged, brought to light after a sitting lawmaker made secret recordings for more than a year.
abstract: New, separate bribery scheme emerges in wake of arrest of New York State Sen Malcolm A Smith, unearthed by secret recordings made by state Assemblyman Nelson L Castro, leading to arrest of fellow Assemblyman Eric A Stevenson; he is accused of accepting more than $22,000 in bribes to help real estate developers open adult day care centers in his Bronx district.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN WEISER and MARC SANTORA
byline.contributor: Winnie Hu and Colin Moynihan contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Two days after a corruption scandal rocked Albany, a new, unrelated plot emerged, brought to light after a sitting lawmaker made secret recordings for more than a year.

headline.seo: Assemblyman Eric Stevenson Is Accused of Taking Bribes
headline.main: In 2nd Alleged Bribe Scheme, a Legislator Was in on the Case
headline.print_headline: 2nd Bribe Case, With Legislator As an Informer
